summary: Website to apologize to girlfriend Radhika, featuring a cute teddy animation and a provided apology letter, optimized for mobile and with no footer credit.
architectural_notes: Do not display any footer credit (no attribution).
Add a call-to-action button at the end/footer area after the letter text ('mai gussa nhi hu'); clicking it should trigger playback of the provided/attached video.
known_issues: Teddy image currently needs transparent background (remove background / ensure PNG transparency).
Text appears too small and not bold enough; needs increased size and bold styling.

existing_features.title: Create a single-page apology website addressed to “Radhika” that presents a romantic, heartfelt apology experience suitable for sending as a link.
Add a cute teddy animation on the page (lightweight and performant on mobile), displayed prominently near the top of the page.
Render the provided apology letter text on the page exactly as provided by the user (including line breaks, slang/Hinglish, and emojis) in a readable letter-style container.
Ensure the entire site is fully mobile-compatible and responsive (layout, typography, spacing, and animation scaling).
Do not show any footer credit or “built by” branding anywhere in the UI.
Apply a coherent, cute romantic visual theme (colors, typography, and layout) consistently across the page, using a warm pastel palette (avoid blue/purple as dominant colors).
Add required generated image assets into frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them directly from the frontend (do not fetch images through the backend).

Update the teddy illustration to use a PNG with a fully transparent background (no white/solid box behind the teddy), and ensure the teddy displayed in the TeddyAnimation component uses the updated transparent asset.
Increase the size of the apology letter text and make it bold (or at least clearly boldened compared to current) for improved readability across mobile and desktop.

Make the entire single-page apology site fully mobile-compatible by auditing and fixing any remaining responsive layout, typography, spacing, and animation scaling issues so it renders cleanly on small screens.

Add a footer section directly after the apology letter content (after the current closing/signature area) that includes a short line telling Radhika that you are not angry and asking her to click the button.
Add a prominent button in that footer section; when clicked, it must play the provided/attached video (served as a local static asset from the frontend) without navigating away from the page.
Ensure the new footer message + button + video player styling matches the existing cute romantic theme (warm pastel palette) and does not introduce any 'built by' credit or branding.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an apology website addressed to Radhika
Add a cute teddy animation to the site
Include the provided apology letter text on the page
Remove/avoid any footer credit on the site
Use a PNG teddy image with background removed (transparent)
Increase text size and make text bold for better readability
Add a footer button after the letter ('mai gussa nhi hu') that prompts Radhika to click; on click, play the attached video

projectName: Mobile-friendly apology site for Radhika with cute teddy animation and apology letter
